# type

**Instance Property**

The media item type.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: INMediaItemType { get }
```

## Describing the Media Item

- **artwork**: Artwork for the media item.
- **identifier**: The value your app uses to identify the media item.
- **title**: The media item title.
- **artist**: The artist associated with the media item.
- **INMediaItemType**: The type of content the media item describes.
